biotools.summary: Fast inference and visualization of ancestral scenarios. PastML infers ancestral characters on a rooted phylogenetic tree with annotated tips, using maximum likelihood or parsimony. The result is then visualised as a zoomable html map.

bioschemas.name: PastML
bioschemas.summary: Fast inference and visualization of ancestral scenarios. PastML infers ancestral characters on a rooted phylogenetic tree with annotated tips, using maximum likelihood or parsimony. The result is then visualised as a zoomable html map.
